title: How to unsubscribe from DoorDash (DashPass)
description: You can cancel your DashPass subscription through the DoorDash app or website. Follow these steps to cancel your subscription and avoid future charges.

steps_1.title: Cancel DoorDash DashPass via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your DoorDash DashPass subscription via the website:

*   Open the DoorDash website (doordash.com) and log in.
*   Tap or click on the 'Account' section.
*   Find and select 'Manage DashPass'.
*   Tap or click on 'Pause or Cancel Membership' or 'End Subscription'.
*   Confirm your cancellation when prompted.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

steps_2.title: Cancel DoorDash DashPass via App
steps_2.description:
To cancel your DoorDash DashPass subscription via the mobile app:

*   Open the DoorDash app and log in.
*   Tap or click on the 'Account' section.
*   Find and select 'Manage DashPass'.
*   Tap or click on 'Pause or Cancel Membership' or 'End Subscription'.
*   Confirm your cancellation when prompted.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your DoorDash DashPass subscription quickly and easily. Follow our step-by-step guide to manage your DoorDash subscription and avoid unwanted charges.
